notes.note:
Improved performance and web compatibility, with support for the [WebP image format][1]: WebP brings the same image quality as existing formats at smaller file sizes, which saves bandwidth and speeds up page load.


  [1]: https://developers.google.com/speed/webp/
Improved performance: Scrolling is faster and more responsive.

Enhanced security for macOS, Linux, and Android users via stronger stack smashing protection which is now enabled by default for all platforms. "Stack smashing" is a common security attack in which malicious actors corrupt or take control of a vulnerable program.
Restored Chromecast controls to the location bar.

system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.1
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
text:
We'd like to extend a special thank you to all of the [new Mozillians][1] who contributed to this release of Firefox!


  [1]: https://blog.mozilla.org/community/2019/01/23/firefox-65-new-contributors/
title: Firefox for Android 65.0 Release
